attributes.title: David Franklin
attributes.imdb: http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0291401/'''David Franklin''' (born 7 May 1962) is an Australian actor best known to audiences for his roles as Meeklo Braca in the science fiction TV series ''Farscape'' and as Brutus in ''Xena: Warrior Princess''. He has also appeared in films such as ''Crocodile Dundee in Los Angeles'' and ''The Matrix Reloaded''.In ''Game of Thrones: A Telltale Games Series'', he voices Maester Ortengryn.==Credits==Telltale Game Series Credits
